summary: Genomic sequencing technology has the potential to improve how we monitor and treat infectious diseases. By revealing the genetic codes of pathogens, it can allow researchers to develop targeted vaccines, track new variants of the virus that causes COVID-19, and more. title: Science & Tech Spotlight: Genomic Sequencing Of Infectious Pathogens
